name: Big Bench Audio
description: Benchmark for evaluating audio language models on complex multi-step logical reasoning (Speech-to-Text) and speech-to-speech capabilities.

metrics.name: Accuracy (S2T)
metrics.definition: Average accuracy on speech-to-text reasoning tasks.

metrics.name: Speech Reasoning Performance Score (S2S)
metrics.definition: Accuracy of reasoning over spoken content in speech-to-speech mode.

test_method: Evaluated in two modes: Speech-to-Text (S2T) for understanding/reasoning, and Speech-to-Speech (S2S) for real-time interaction capabilities.
notes: Step-Audio-R1.1 is referred to as 'Step-Audio-R1 Realtime' in the technical report for S2S benchmarks.
